response.job_title: Sr. Sales Account Manager at Aspen Technology
response.skills: CRM Sales Force, Trabajo en equipo, Prospección, Ingeniería química, Chemical Engineering, Ingeniería, Product Development, Analysis, Engineering, Ingeniería de procesos, Planificación estratégica, Planificación de proyectos, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Office, Team Leadership, Negociación, English, Inglés, Spanish, Español

profile_positions.title: Sr. Sales Account Manager at Aspen Technology, Inc.

profile_positions.description:
-Propose technological solutions according to the client requirements
-Manage and develop business opportunities in Colombia, Ecuador y Perú territories.
-Maintain and grow with existing clients.
-Prices estimation of engineering projects and software.
-Make commercial proposals considering taxes, technical and logistic aspects, man-hours cost, among others.
-Planning, execute and report the commercial activity through SalesForce according to the company sales plan.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniera de Ventas

profile_positions.description:
Supported R&D leader in the formulation process and manufacturing of new products and quality projects.
- Pilot plant escalation
- Proposed manufacturing methods improvements
- Chemical analysis and stability of new products
- Sensorial tests of new products
profile_positions.title: Practicante en el área de Innovación y Desarrollo Químico

company.name: Aspen Technology
company.description: AspenTech is a global software leader helping industries at the forefront of the world’s dual challenge meet the increasing demand for resources from a rapidly growing population in a profitable and sustainable manner. AspenTech solutions address complex environments where it is critical to optimize the asset design, operation and maintenance lifecycle. Through our unique combination of deep domain expertise and innovation, customers in asset-intensive industries can run their assets safer, greener, longer and faster to improve their operational excellence. To learn more, visit AspenTech.com.
